summary:
**Family Guy** is an American animated TV show made by Seth MacFarlane. It started in 1999 on Fox. The show is about the Griffins, a funny and weird family living in Quahog, Rhode Island. They include Peter, Lois, their kids Meg, Chris, and Stewie, and their talking dog Brian. The humor often comes from jokes that pop up during the show, making fun of American culture.

The show got popular, so Fox brought it back after canceling it. It's won awards and has been nominated for big ones like the Emmy for Best Comedy. There are also video games, books, and even a spin-off show. Family Guy will keep airing through 2025.
title: Family Guy
